amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $10 million in funding for the Denali Commission and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike all funding for the Denali Commission and apply the savings of $10 million to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 243 (Roll no. 385).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 243 (Roll no. 385).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Chabot.
